attributes.action: stop pets being giving away free on facebook,freeads and gutree etc
attributes.additional_details: Advertising free pets is an open invitation to dog fighters and animal abusers.cats and kittens are Abused and used as bait for fishing and lots of other horrible things. Let's make it harder for people that abuse animals and more difficult to get. If we put a price on an animal they will be less likely be used and or abused! please do something to help these poor animals who cant speek for themselves !
